table_name.create: idNumber bigint, id bigint, column_id string, title string, html_title string, source string, pos int, create_date string, create_by string, last_update_by string, last_update_date string, keyword string, version_number int, is_deleted int, authority_tenant_id bigint, authority_company_id bigint, authority_corp_id bigint, authority_project_id bigint, company_id bigint, city_id int
table_name.select: ( select id as idNumber, id, column_id, title, html_title, source, pos, create_date, create_by, last_update_by, last_update_date, keyword, version_number, is_deleted, authority_tenant_id, authority_company_id, authority_corp_id, authority_project_id, company_id, city_id from prod_product) spark_sql_prod_product
